io.getstream.client.okhttp.repo.utils

Class UriBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.getstream.client.okhttp.repo.utils.UriBuilder

  • public class UriBuilder
extends Object
    It helps to compose paths with and/or without attributes using a fluid pattern. This class has a limited implementation of UriBuilder and it has been built to meet the current needs.
